summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of West 60th Street, from 32nd Avenue Northwest to a point approximately 400 feet west of 36th Avenue Northwest; by grading and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 7502 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
